home.suiteCommunityDesc: Host communities and engagement drops with Community and Arena in one place.

home.complianceOfficialApiDesc: All messaging runs through the verified Technology Provider flow with delivery checks.
home.complianceTemplatesDesc: Template creation, review, approvals, and delivery tracking live in one workspace.

home.integrationsSubtitle: Battle-tested infrastructure from verify to deploy.
home.timelineSubtitle: From Meta Hub to full ecosystem — transparent progress.
home.ctaSectionDesc: Start with a free workspace and connect the official Meta Cloud API in minutes.
home.trustSubtitle: Built with enterprise-grade security and compliance.

about.title: About Gigaviz
about.subtitle: Unified Digital Ecosystem to Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage.
about.storyTitle: From practical needs to a unified ecosystem
about.storyP1: Gigaviz started from a real problem: small teams needed to move fast without losing control. From there, we designed modules that eventually converged into one unified system. Operated by PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia, this ecosystem is designed to accelerate execution while maintaining clarity and security.
about.storyP2: With the Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage framework, each module is built to reinforce the others — from content production to access control and billing.
about.founderBio: Giusty built Gigaviz so teams can focus on results without being distracted by disconnected tools. His mission is to deliver an ecosystem that is practical, secure, and measurable.
about.problem2: Clear decision-making through data and audit trails.
about.problem3: Access control to keep teams secure as they grow.
about.timeline1Desc: Started from the practical needs of a small team requiring fast, organized workflows.
about.timeline2Desc: Began with messaging and operational solutions, then evolved into a suite of modules.
about.timeline3Desc: All modules unified with consistent identity, workspace, and billing systems.
about.timeline4Desc: PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia established as the operational foundation for ecosystem expansion.
about.timeline5Desc: Focused on Create, Automate, Monetize, and Manage in one unified system.
about.nsCreateDesc: Help teams produce content, assets, and work materials faster.
about.nsAutomateDesc: Automate routine processes so teams can focus on strategic work.
about.nsMonetizeDesc: Provide billing and transaction tools to support revenue growth.
about.nsManageDesc: Control access, audit trails, and dashboards to scale safely.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to move forward with Gigaviz?
about.ctaDesc: Get Started now to streamline your team workflow.

pricing.title: Subscription plans for the entire ecosystem
pricing.subtitle: Pricing below are starting prices and can be adjusted based on module requirements and usage volume.
pricing.starterDesc: For small teams needing core modules and basic workflows.
pricing.starterF1: Access to Core OS and Workspace
pricing.proDesc: For operational teams needing automation and inbox management.
pricing.businessDesc: For teams needing multi-workspace support and advanced integrations.
pricing.enterpriseDesc: For enterprise needs, custom SLA, and specialized integrations.
pricing.alwaysIncludedDesc: Every plan includes core modules and initial setup so your team can start operating immediately.
pricing.include3: Onboarding and quick training for core teams
pricing.include5: Product roadmap aligned with team needs
pricing.assurancePhasedDesc: Staged implementation plan to ensure teams are ready without overwhelming them.
pricing.assuranceBudgetDesc: Usage limits per workspace with periodic usage reports.
pricing.assuranceSupportDesc: Custom SLA for Business and Enterprise plans.
pricing.assuranceNote: Business & Enterprise plans receive quarterly roadmap reviews and module adjustments.
pricing.tokenDesc: Tokens are used for AI features such as copy generation, summarization, and creative studio. Token pricing may change based on model costs and usage.
pricing.tokenNote1: Tokens are calculated per output or request.
pricing.tokenNote2: Token pricing will be displayed before heavy usage.
pricing.tokenNote3: You can set token limits per workspace.
pricing.customPlanDesc: Contact our team for enterprise plans, custom SLA, and specialized integrations.
pricing.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about Gigaviz pricing.
pricing.faq1A: Yes. Free accounts give you access to explore the platform with limited features. You can upgrade to Starter, Pro, Business, or Enterprise when you're ready.
pricing.faq2Q: What payment methods do you accept?
pricing.faq2A: We support bank transfer and digital wallet payments for Indonesia. International payment methods (Visa, Mastercard, PayPal) are coming soon.
pricing.faq3Q: Can I change my plan later?
pricing.faq3A: Absolutely. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect on your next billing cycle.
pricing.faq4Q: What are tokens and how are they billed?
pricing.faq4A: Tokens are used for AI features like text generation, summarization, and smart replies. They're billed separately from your subscription based on actual usage.
pricing.faq5Q: Is there a per-seat pricing model?
pricing.faq5A: Each plan includes a certain number of seats. Additional seats can be added depending on your plan tier. Enterprise plans offer custom seat configurations.
pricing.faq6Q: Do you offer discounts for annual billing?
pricing.faq6A: Yes, annual subscriptions receive a discount compared to monthly billing. Contact our sales team for specific pricing.
pricing.faq7Q: What happens if I exceed my token limit?
pricing.faq7A: You'll receive a notification when approaching your limit. You can purchase additional tokens or upgrade to a higher plan for more included tokens.
pricing.faq8A: Please refer to our Refund and Cancellation Policy for details. Generally, unused subscription time may be eligible for prorated refunds.

contact.title: Contact Gigaviz
contact.subtitle: Send your questions or needs, and our team will respond as soon as possible.
contact.note1: Include your main goal and business context.
contact.note2: Share your team size and the targets you want to reach.
contact.note3: If you need press assets, use the official Media Kit.
contact.responseTimeDesc: 1-2 business days for general questions, faster for priority needs.
contact.success: Message sent! We'll get back to you soon.
contact.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

getStarted.title: Get Started with Gigaviz
getStarted.subtitle: Choose the fastest way to join the ecosystem: Individual or Team (Workspace).
getStarted.featureNote: Specific features unlock based on your subscription plan. Token costs (AI/WhatsApp API) are calculated separately based on usage.
getStarted.onboardingTitle: Join the ecosystem in a few steps
getStarted.onboardingDesc: Choose your plan, complete your account, then activate modules based on your needs.
getStarted.step2: Complete your account and verify your email.
getStarted.step3: Activate modules, billing, and tokens based on your plan.
getStarted.comparisonSubtitle: Modules and access are customized based on your chosen plan.
getStarted.trustDesc: We establish security foundations from the start of onboarding to keep the ecosystem safe as it grows.
getStarted.trust1: Security-first with input validation and access control.
getStarted.trust3: Fair use and anti-abuse to maintain service quality.
getStarted.faq1Q: Can I sign up for free?
getStarted.faq1A: Yes. Free accounts have limited access (view-only/locked) until you activate a plan.
getStarted.faq2Q: What's the difference between Individual and Team?
getStarted.faq2A: Individual is for solo creators with 1 workspace. Team provides multi-member access, RBAC, and more comprehensive controls.
getStarted.faq3A: Tokens are AI and WhatsApp API usage charges calculated separately from subscriptions, based on actual usage.
getStarted.faq4A: Yes, your plan can be adjusted anytime based on your team's needs and activated modules.
getStarted.faq5Q: Do I need a credit card?
getStarted.faq5A: Not always. Payment methods depend on your plan and applicable billing policies.
getStarted.faq6Q: What about usage policies and security?
getStarted.faq6A: Gigaviz enforces usage policies, access controls, and auditing to maintain security and prevent abuse.
getStarted.ctaDesc: Create an account to choose your plan, then review pricing details if needed.

status.legendDesc: Live = production-ready, Beta = limited access, Planned = not yet available.

status.officeA1: Template library for docs and sheets.
status.marketplaceA1: Digital product listings ready to sell.
status.moduleAccessNote: Module access depends on your subscription plan.

status.ctaTitle: Ready to join the Gigaviz ecosystem?
status.ctaDesc: Choose a plan that fits your needs and follow our development roadmap.

mediaKit.title: Gigaviz Media Kit
mediaKit.subtitle: Official brand assets for press, partners, and community.
mediaKit.brand1: Gigaviz is a SaaS ecosystem for Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage.
mediaKit.brand2: Indonesia-first and global-ready, with a modular approach.
mediaKit.brand3: Security-first: access control, audit, and workspace separation.
mediaKit.brand4: Operated by PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia.
mediaKit.northStarDesc: Four pillars that guide module design and user experience.
mediaKit.logoFileFormat: Files are available in PNG format.
mediaKit.usageGuide1: Keep clear space at least the height of the letter G.
mediaKit.usageGuide2: Do not rotate, stretch, or add effects.
mediaKit.usageGuide3: Use the mark for small sizes, horizontal logo for headers.
mediaKit.bgVariationsDesc: Use the gold variant on dark backgrounds and the dark variant on light backgrounds. If unsure, use the horizontal logo on a navy background with high contrast.
mediaKit.colorsDesc: The colors below follow the current Gigaviz design tokens in the UI.
mediaKit.typoPrimary: Primary font: Plus Jakarta Sans (text and UI).
mediaKit.copyDesc: Use these descriptions for press releases, partner decks, or product catalogs.
mediaKit.copyShortText: Gigaviz is a SaaS ecosystem that unifies create, automate, monetize, and manage modules in one account. Built Indonesia-first and ready to scale globally, Gigaviz helps teams work fast without losing control, security, and visibility through consistent workspaces, billing, and audits for operations, creative, and customer comms so daily decisions stay measurable.
mediaKit.copyStandardText: Gigaviz is a digital product ecosystem that helps businesses, creators, and ops teams run end-to-end processes: Create, Automate, Monetize, and Manage. With one account and workspace, teams can activate modules like Core OS for identity and billing, Meta Hub for WhatsApp Cloud API, Helper for AI, Office for documents, Studio for creative assets, plus Marketplace, Arena, Apps, Pay, and Community as growth layers. The Indonesia-first approach covers local needs, while modular architecture keeps it ready for global scale. Security is foundational: role-based access control, audit logs, and workspace-level data separation. Gigaviz is operated by PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia and focuses on measurable outcomes—helping teams move fast without losing control. We provide transparent release statuses (Live, Beta, Coming Soon) so partners can plan implementations. Each module is built to interconnect, enabling data, access, and costs to be monitored from a single dashboard with concise reports and periodic audits.
mediaKit.copyTaglineText: Integrated digital ecosystem for Create -> Automate -> Monetize -> Manage.
mediaKit.contactEntity: Business entity: PT Gigaviz Digital Indonesia.
mediaKit.contactMediaDesc: For media questions, please reach us via the Contact page.
mediaKit.ctaDesc: Download assets, use the official copy, and explore our modules.

integrations.trademarkDesc: WhatsApp, Meta, and other trademarks are the property of their respective owners. Integrations do not imply affiliation or endorsement.
